Using your device security instead of a password makes it harder to get tricked into giving up your Facebook account.
Facebook is adding support for passkeys on its mobile app. That means youll be a… [+2597 chars]

articles.author: Bill Toulas
articles.title: 'Stargazers' use fake Minecraft mods to steal player passwords - BleepingComputer
articles.description: A large-scale malware campaign specifically targets Minecraft players with malicious mods and cheats that infect Windows devices with infostealers that steal credentials, authentication tokens, and cryptocurrency wallets.
